title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1958/88 of 24 May 1988 on the application of Decision No 1/88 of the EEC-Norway Joint Committee amending Protocol 3 concerning the definition of the concept of ' originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 1958/88  of 24 May 1988  on the application of Decision No 1/88 of the EEC-Norway Joint Committee amending Protocol 3 concerning the definition of the concept of Â´originating products' and methods of administrative  cooperation
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision No 1/88 of the EEC-Norway Joint Committee shall apply in the Community.
The text of the Decision is attached to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities  It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1988.    This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments: Done at Brussels, 24 May 1988.  For the Council  The President  H.-D. GENSCHER
